name: Dimension Boogaloo
description:
Before the ages began a true terror reigned across every plane of existance.
A foul evil named Cubehead and his mistress, The Hunger entrapped all the cosmos and living planes, ensuing the millenia of Darkness.

(drawing of him and her and maybe like a static big war/fight scene)

A brave string of rebels named the Lightbringers fought with the Enlightened ones, eventually trapping the master and freeing the cosmos from his Mistress's mass consumption
As foretold by the prophecy, he has broken free from his chains and He and his Mistress seek to bring havoc once more.

You are the last in the lineage of the Lightbringers and we have awakened the powers within you.
He will try anything to prevent you from stopping his goal, cutting through dimensions to slow you down.

Go, Stupid, and save the world or something...

Game Team:
Ben Mitchell - Code
Matas Šegždavičius - Animation & VFX
Jasmin Patel @jazpatl - Pixel Art
Braeden Burrows - Story & Title screen art

Pixel button assets: Pixel Button Prompts! (Keyboard/Gamepad)
RetrocadeMedia on itch
8-Bit sound effects: 8-Bit Sound Effects [100+ SFX] by BeepYeah! on itch
Overworld Music: Mini Loops: Memory Lane by Yadu Rajiv on itch
